meta.hint:
A pronoun is a word that takes the place of a noun or nouns.
Plural pronouns take the place of plural nouns (more than one person, place or thing).
The kids liked the books. They liked them. (They takes the place of the kids. Them takes the place of the books.)
These are plural pronouns: we, you, they, us, them
